boardgame.name: Big Boggle
Boggle Deluxe
Boggle Master
Maxi Boggle
Maxi Paroliere
Super Boggle
boardgame.description: Big Boggle is a timed word game where players attempt to find as many connected words as possible from the face up letters resting in a 25 cube grid. When the timer runs out, players compare their list of words and remove any shared words. Points are then awarded for remaining words, depending on how many letters are in the word._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Big Boggle is similar to the standard Boggle, but with the following changes:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; uses a 5x5 grid instead of 4x4_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; the minimum word size is 4 letters instead of 3_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Box has a LOT of shelf scuff. Case, cubes, timer, rules are all there. This is a Blue Box version of Big Boggle, (though not the newer BIG blue box version). Similar in size to the Master Boggle boxes.
Box show a LOT of shelf scuff, but the box is solid and the cubes, timer, and rack are all there and in fine shape.

Boggle Deluxe, in shrink with pearl cubes. This is the 5x5 version of the game, which is the same, though with much nicer components, as Big Boggle. I also have a Big Boggle, the description of which is below. If you want to buy the one below, let me know, and I will change this listing so it is for that copy not the Deluxe. The Big Boggle shown below is priced at $15.00. Box has a lot of wear, and has had tape put on it in one spot to keep the cover from shredding further. Game is also missing the rules, and the timer has no feet. Other than that, the case and cubes are there.
Big Boggle WITH CHALLENGE CUBE! Box is in excellent condition, though it is missing any kind of cardboard insert.
